title: Best of The Program | Guests: Matt Walsh & Joe Green | 6/5/20
description:
“Church of Cowards” author Matt Walsh joins to tell the story of a white man named Tony Timpa, who died in a very similar way to George Floyd. So why haven’t we heard of him? Glenn looks into how police brutality is unacceptable and on the rise for all races. Store owner Joe Green armed himself to protect his store from looters and joins to tell the story.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
